name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in creating high-performance applications, specializing in **.NET**, **Python**, **React**, and **FastAPI**. Proficient in developing and integrating **REST APIs** and implementing geospatial features using **Leaflet**, **Mapbox GL JS**, **GeoJSON**, and **OpenMapTiles**. Experienced in deploying scalable systems on **Azure** and configuring cloud-native architectures that enhance performance and maintainability.
Demonstrated ability to leverage **AI/ML** technologies for predictive analytics and real-time processing while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in microservices and CI/CD pipelines, along with a commitment to fostering operational efficiency through MLOps practices utilizing technologies like **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust web applications as a **Senior Full Stack Developer** leveraging **.NET** and **Python (FastAPI)**, ensuring high performance and reliability across health and finance sectors.
• Created dynamic and interactive user interfaces utilizing **React** and integrating features like **Leaflet** and **Mapbox GL JS** for real-time geospatial data visualizations.
• Designed and implemented **REST APIs** for seamless interaction between front-end and back-end components, adhering to established standards for security and performance.
• Ensured real-time data processing and effective management of geographic data formats such as **GeoJSON**, using **OpenMapTiles** for optimized mapping solutions.
• Led the integration of third-party services and libraries to support features like **BBOX** searches, vector features, and raster tiles, enhancing application capabilities.
• Utilized cloud services on **Azure**, deploying applications with scalability in mind, while leveraging tools like **TiTiler** and **COG** for optimized geospatial data serving.
• Spearheaded initiatives to enhance code quality and maintainability through rigorous testing frameworks and practices using tools such as **PyTest** and **Jest**, ensuring a minimum of **90% test coverage** across all projects.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver data-intensive applications capable of handling over **1 million** user requests per hour while maintaining response times under **200 ms**.
• Delivered comprehensive documentation and training, fostering skill development amongst team members and ensuring knowledge transfer in the latest technology stacks used in projects.

Utilized **Python** (FastAPI) and **.NET** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, which enhanced scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Developed front-end applications with **React** (18), effectively utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels for over **30,000** users.
Implemented REST APIs to seamlessly integrate with various back-end services, improving data flow efficiency by **25%** throughout the platform.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React** and integrated with **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and reducing anomaly detection time by **40%**.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Azure Service Bus** and **RabbitMQ**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows like payments and alerts, reducing system latency by **15%**.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing of over **5TB** of data monthly.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost** on **Azure ML**, enhancing proactive detection of suspicious activities and reducing false positives by **30%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into back-end services, achieving a processing time of under **2 seconds** per transaction.

Developed and optimized applications using **Python** (FastAPI) and **.NET** frameworks, ensuring high performance and scalability for dynamic geospatial features on the platform.
Engineered responsive frontend applications utilizing **React** while integrating **Leaflet**, **Mapbox GL JS**, and **GeoJSON** for enhanced data visualization in real-time mapping solutions.
Designed and implemented robust **REST APIs** for seamless interaction between the frontend and backend systems, facilitating smooth data exchanges and enhancing user experiences.
Leveraged cloud services like **Azure** for deploying applications reliably, ensuring high availability and performance under varying traffic loads across key modules.
Utilized **COG** (Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF) with efficient raster tiles management, delivering optimized map rendering while maintaining low latency under high user concurrency.
Implemented advanced data analytics and visualization strategies using **OpenMapTiles**, driving insights and enhancing user engagement with geographic data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 for secure user authentication and compliance with GDPR regulations, providing a secure environment for sensitive operations.
Managed complex integrations with external mapping services and APIs, producing interactive and accessible experiences for a mobile-first audience.
Executed comprehensive version control and deployment workflows using CI/CD pipelines, achieving more than **90%** automation in deployment processes with zero downtime during updates.
Collaborated across teams to achieve a **30%** reduction in response times through optimized query handling and caching strategies, improving overall application responsiveness significantly.
